summary: Added 10 comprehensive DevOps, Infrastructure, and Testing tasks for ICN project covering local development environment (Docker Compose), production deployment (Docker images, Kubernetes), CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions for pallets and Vortex), observability stack (Prometheus, Grafana, Jaeger), comprehensive testing (unit tests 85%+ coverage, integration tests, E2E Moonriver testing), and security audit preparation (Oak Security/SRLabs engagement)

devops_infrastructure: T028: Local Development Environment with Docker Compose (10,000 tokens)
T029: Production Director Node Docker Image (11,000 tokens)
T030: Super-Node Kubernetes Deployment - 7 Regions (13,000 tokens)
T031: CI/CD Pipeline for Substrate Pallets (9,000 tokens)
T032: CI/CD Pipeline for Vortex AI Engine (7,000 tokens)
testing: T034: Comprehensive Pallet Unit Tests - 85%+ Coverage (9,500 tokens)
T035: Integration Tests - Full Protocol Flow (8,000 tokens)
T037: End-to-End Testing on Moonriver Testnet (9,000 tokens)
